entries.text: No, no, can't buy a boat, no, no?
I really had a bunch of accidents.
All the settings just flew away.
I built this stream screen in a huge rush.
I'm not exactly in a state I can show yet.
Even though I was standing on a live stage just a while ago...
I felt like appearing "alive" right now might be a bit much.
It's a little hard to come out.
I thought I might start a maid cafe or something.
Well, ultimately I was wearing the Live T-shirt.
So conversely, even though it was a Live T-shirt...
Don't call out with a loud voice...
That kind of situation is nice too.
It's not like I want to do that kind of play with you.
Listen, I didn't put this outfit on...
Just to do a play with you.
I just simply wanted to unveil it.
That's the only reason I wore it.
In high spirits right away, but...
How is it? How is it? How is it?
It was the first reveal today.
And did you see the devil outfit too?
I was born to make you guys happy-nyan.
Did you think I'd make you happy?
Captain usually wears black clothes, so...
Black suits me pretty well too, right?
I think I'll go with Angel today.
Since I'm in an angelic mood.
What are you guys doing now?
Watching at home and finished dinner?
"Since there's a barcode, can we buy you?"
What you can buy with this barcode probably differs by 3rd Gen member, but...
With this barcode on Marine, what you can buy is...
Well, look, you get it, right?
What you can buy is only the right to fondle the right boob.
Ah, heading home! On the train home!
Wait, being on the train home means around you...
There might be other Ichimi (Crew) too.
Like, "Ah, that person is watching Captain's stream too"?
"Is the half-price sticker not there yet?"
Ah, Marine's boobs aren't gonna become half-price that easily!
The right boob of the idol who was on the K-Arena stage...
There's no way it'd be half-price, you guys.
And when you scan it, *beep*, it's a huge amount.
Man, the people at the venue looked like they were having so much fun.
Captain is so happy seeing you enjoy yourselves.
Normally, the one who goes home like the wind...
Don't you think it's rare for Marine to come home at explosive speed?
Ah, looking closely, the windmill behind me is stopped.
I prepared in a huge rush so...
It's supposed to be a loop but...
Let's leave it stopped for today.
Usually Marine would take it easy too, but...
There's a reason I rushed home at explosive speed.
You'd think there isn't an after-party, right?
So I can't stream at night.
Day after tomorrow I have a collab promised.
What was happening the day after that?
Wait, I really want to spin this.
I set it up in a rush.
I'll fix it by next time.
The last thing I ate was a bento at...
I didn't have time so I couldn't eat.
There's nothing in the house right now.
You're wondering what I should eat, right?
What do you think it is, cuties?
Eh, Captain's voice is cracking a bit.
This is a gift from Peko-mammy.
Wait a sec, I'm blowing my nose.
What is this? It's too delicious.
I wonder what flavor this is?
There's Marine's right boob, isn't there?
Maybe I'll give you the right boob.
Ah, I want to talk about my impressions too...
Should I drink water? One sec.
I want to talk about impressions...
Where do I even start, where...
Where on earth do I start...
Ah, what should I talk about first?
There was just so much packed in.
The Holo-mems came and said it crisply, but...
Since it was the first MC right after starting...
And it ended up becoming "Kon", I thought.
No, thank you for doing your best with the calls.
You did great, you guys really did great.
You know, when we do a live show at a venue...
I just want to start living with you guys.
Let's just live at the live venue, all of us.
It was hard to leave like that.
I wanted to stay together forever.
But if we started living together...
You guys would get sick of Marine instantly.
How was the love level of the calls?
I'm glad you memorized the songs fully.
It's amazing you could do it.
It was really tough, wasn't it?
Sometimes I can't catch the words.
It comes in, it reaches me, so...
She was crying her eyes out, but...
"Eh, but nobody cried yesterday, right?" when we talked about that...
Noel-chan was crying at the opening.
Noel-chan was crying at the opening.
And today, she cried at the end.
Flare-chan cried too, I was surprised.
It's "Ai Ai Ai I love you".
It is "Ai Ai Ai I love you".
Doing calls during the end roll.
I thought "You can really do it well".
The part where names are called in order...
It got a bit fuzzy but...
I was listening to your voices the whole time.
Well, Marine's original songs are quite well known so I felt you could do the calls, but...
Since the 3rd Gen EP songs were released just recently...
I thought maybe you hadn't fully memorized them yet, but...
You guys were totally rocking it.
Since the voices are huge, I can hear quite a bit.
I can hear it clearly even backstage.
Even in the back, I can hear a lot.
Yeah, I have memories of singing "Shaka Beach" with Noel-chan.
Coming here, after a long time...
Since I wanted to hear Noel-chan's rap...
Surprisingly Flare-chan wanted to hear Noel's rap too.
Since it was Noel Rap, Noel Rap after the Noel Medley...
If Noel-chan did a solo live...
I felt like "Is this what it would be like?"
I heard girls' voices during the MC.
I felt like a male idol.
Being screamed at "Kyaaa Kyaaa" by girls.
I saw people saying that here and there.
Yeah, was Captain's writing easy to understand?
We were lined up writing on paper like this but...
The staff member was taking it to be scanned.
Like taking it to a scanner.
You know those things that spray sanitizer automatically when you put your hand under?
That activated, and Flare's handwritten lyrics got completely soaked.
But if you want Captain's handwritten text, it's on sale right now.
If you purchase the full set...
It's really the same size as Marine.
When I spread the cover on the futon...
And lay down next to it...
The height was exactly the same.
If you want to hold Marine in bed...
If you hold the Marine dakimakura cover...
It is undoubtedly the same size.
Something happy is planned to be released.
Around the end of the month...
For you guys it might be...
It might be that kind of thing.
I've been moving around a lot for that too.
Maybe if it goes without issues...
There's a chance a problem might occur...
And it might get delayed, but...
The thing I've kept hinting at...
Will you know if I say that?
Maybe hinting at for about 2 years...
There are various other things too.
I worked really hard on it.
Even the day before Captain's live...
I woke up like "Crap, I overslept".
I ran to the dance lesson and...
She does her own lives too.
Anyway, it was hustle and bustle...
No, January was truly tough, super...
But having finished one big live show...
But it's lonely now that it's over.
But there's the Fes, right? Still.
Will I see you at Fes next?
Yeah, I think she was watching from the audience seats.
Seeing faces was the most fun.
During my turn, I have no leeway but...
I sit quite a bit and...
Totally visible, especially the front row...
And the camera picks you out.
Even if you're far away, the camera picks you out so we see quite a bit.
There were all kinds of people but...
Watching you guys was super fun.
Calling at full power the whole time.
It made me want to work hard too.
Hair, nobody really combed it back.
Your throats must have been rough.
As someone who has wrecked her throat 1 million times...
Resting slowly is the most important thing.
Maybe I'll do some dressing room talk? Dressing room talk.
Umm, well, we talked about various fun things but...
There's a Pan-Myu in Yokohama. (Anpanman Museum).
There was a gift of Anpanman bread.
Probably one of the staff members...
"Pekora was looking at the ingredient list."
She was watching that the whole time.
There was Panman bread as a gift...
And, I really wanted to eat the Pan-Myu Anpanman...
No, wait, I really wanted to eat Melonpanna...
I went to buy it once.
Have you guys gone to buy it?
Have you gone to Jam Uncle's...
Marine hasn't been to Pan-Myu itself...
But at that Jam-san's Bread Factory...
You say "Excuse me, one Melonpanna-chan please."
"Jam Uncle, bread please!" they say to the oven in the back.
Then the oven opens *pah* and sucks *suu*.
And silently, the bread comes out *suu*.
"Here, Jam Uncle baked it for you!" is how they give it to you.
It's different from my interpretation of Jam.
Doesn't he serve the bread saying "Here's some delicious bread"?
Also the bread from the oven...
It's not fresh baked, it's cold.
That it was baked by Jam Uncle...
I want it to be like that.
Opens the oven and is silent.
If the silent side of the oven is Jam...
It was all women so maybe...
Those people are highly likely Batako.
"Hey, it's a long haul today so don't get irritable, Marine."
"Marine always gets irritable so don't get irritable, okay?"
"Marine, don't suddenly lose motivation halfway," she said.
"I won't lose motivation! It's a Live!"
For a split second, I almost got annoyed.
And the manager too, when Marine...
I returned to a good mood immediately.
Well, the reason I got irritable was...
"Umm, please do this," I was told.
"Please do this one first," I was told.
"Ah, understood," and when I tried to do it...
"No, this one is more urgent so..."
"No, this one!" "No, this one!" I was told.
"I'll do them in order! I'll do both! In order!" I thought.
"I'll do both! Whatever! I'll do both so..."
"Just do both! It's fine! In order!"
"What are you laughing at?" I said.
"You got all prickly~," she said and soothed me.
"Wasn't it because Ichimi were making nice faces at other members?"
Well, Marine too, after all, a little...
I definitely show signs of being jealous, but...
Even though I show those kinds of signs...
Even though they're asking for calls/response...
Eh, I don't want people to think Marine's Ichimi have bad vibes.
Work hard to have good vibes... it's shocking.
I want you to have good vibes there.
Right, "Ichimi have bad manners," I don't want that thought.
Like, you know, "Atai"... usually she'd never say things like that.
She knows the next song is "Bridal Dream", right?
Flare-chan does things like that on purpose.
Right, on purpose, even though she doesn't think that at all.
And after that, Pekora too, like, jealous move.
Well, even though she usually doesn't think it, doing the jealous move.
Well, I know they don't mean it but...
Because I don't see that kind of behavior much.
Even as a joke, I didn't have an impression of them doing that much.
And, like, Bibi was doing concurrent watching?
I was just watching via Holo-Jule (schedule).
Ah, "They're doing it today," I thought.
"What kind of feeling is it?" I wondered.
When I touched on Bibi a little...
It became like "Don't screw with me!"
On X, I'm still a bit busy so...
I haven't watched Bibi's concurrent viewing archive but...
Bibi's face when jealous of Mari-Fre...
A screenshot circulated and it was amazing.
What kind of reaction was it?
I'm thinking I want to see the archive.
Hey, we made Bibi a confirmed fan.
Like, thinking "I have a lot I want to say"...
I was thinking, but my head is...
Ah, right, I want to look back, look back.
Songs everyone wants sung by their own (character)...
We submitted a list of songs and who we want to sing them.
And what got adopted was that, basically.
We decided to do the huddle really suddenly too.
Recently, at Lives, hearing it directly in raw voice at the venue...
I saw quite a few listeners...
Saying they were happy about that.
"Wait, shouldn't we do it too?" it became.
"What to do? What to do?" we thought about it on the day.
Eh, Captain's (group) raw voices reached you guys?
Man, I was super happy and...
The flower stands were super wonderful.
When I looked over the flower stands...
There's an artist named Akasa-san who often draws illustrations...
But seriously, the Akasa-san rate was high.
Eh, wait, Akasa-san again, Akasa-san again!
Akasa-san, you're drawing flower stands to death! Like that.
Did they draw the support ad too?
Did they draw the support ad too?
We talked about that in 3rd Gen.
No, the flower stand designs are amazing too.
Like "How do they think of this?"
Like Marine and the others' "Kyururun" outfits...
"Did you make the outfit first?!" like that.
I think I saw all of them but...
Did you guys see? All of them.
If they get placed outside, Marine and the others can't see them anymore so...
While they were where we could see, everyone hurriedly...
Looked at them before the venue opened.
There were gacha-gacha (capsule toys) at the venue, right?
Ah, "The line was too long, I gave up."
Marine was the one who argued passionately for that. Marine.
Since Marine's solo live, I was arguing for it but...
It didn't happen for Marine's time.
When 3rd Gen Live was decided, I argued passionately again.
I said, and they placed them.
Everyone comes a bit early, right?
What is it, the waiting time?
I think you line up for goods sales too but...
Ah, "Maybe I'll give up on goods" or...
I thought if there were gacha-gacha, it'd be fun.
I thought pulling them is fun.
Seriously, when at AEON Mall and such...
When I get bored, I sit in a massage chair or...
Like things that make Lives fun from now on...
I want to have more new ideas.
I hope we can do another wonderful Live.
I still want to do more.
I want you to come, after all.
I know there are various circumstances but...
We don't get chances to do it often.
It becomes a bit pricey but...
But it's fine, right? Collab cafes, Captain likes them too.
Certainly, thinking about it, Marine eats even if it's pricey.
"Come to Oita Prefecture." That sounds like Noel.
Whether we can fill all seats...
I really want to go to Nagoya.
I'll go to Nagoya, Marine will.
When I went to Nagoya recently too...
I won't forget Hokkaido. Hokkaido is...
Ah right, there was Umisea too. Umisea.
Marine hasn't ridden taxis much in Nagoya.
More like I was the one driving.
And, I drove in Nagoya but...
Certainly, they come suddenly without turn signals.
I don't know, but is that Nagoya Driving?
In the city center, yes, maybe hard.
No matter what, that can't be true.
But I haven't driven for a long while so...
If asked if I can drive...
"Means Paper Gold, right?" (License owned but never drives).
There was a time I forgot to renew.
I went to take a lecture or something...
Captain doesn't have her own car.
When I was at my parents' house...
In a state where gas was running out...
Papa puts gas in on his own so...
When parked in a parking lot...
"Hit it," I made that the story...
Between the parking spot and spot...
When I finished parking and opened (the door) to look...
When the neighboring car opened their door...
"They hit it *bang*," I'll go with that setting, I thought.
If I get angry back, quite often...
"Compensate me! Pay money!" he says things like that but...
"I don't know... there was a scratch..."
This can be applied at various times.
Want him to pick me up...
Coming home is a hassle so I want picking up...
"I told you to come on the way back!"
"Just come already!" If I say that...
"Geez, you really are a devil," he says while coming to pick me up.
Yes, this works on old men in general.
"Body, attend to it, I'm telling you."
"I finished the Live and I'm tired!"
"Do at least that much service activity!"
You don't want to attend to this, right?
New Year... since the year opened...
Probably I haven't done a normal solo stream.
Since I was running through, I didn't do solo streams...
I feel like I haven't said it alone.
Please treat me well this year too.
Eh, I'm surprised at myself too but...
Like, it's weird to say it myself but...
It shows in my attitude, but...
Being able to do it cheerfully until the end...
There are games I want to play too.
"Really a Holo-mem or a fake? Punch 'em," that game...
I want to play it but...
Because of circumstances, it was super hustle-bustle so...
Once things settle down a bit more, I want to start playing.
You say "Because it was with 3rd Gen" but...
Inside Captain, since it's divided into 6 hours each with 3rd Gen...
"My turn is 6 hours, just need to work hard for 6 hours," I thought...
I decided on the 24-hour stream thinking that but...
Marine's turn was almost the whole time.
There was only about 2 hours where I didn't have a turn.
Seriously, I collapsed from the knees.
Thinking "There's no time to rest at all."
"Isn't it a rotation system?!" like that.
Is Pekora doing a look-back after this?
I wonder if Pekora will look back.
I'm thinking of switching with Pekora for today, but...
I'm so hungry I'm about to die.
Then I'll make it jump to Pekora.
How do you do that again?
How do you think I do it?
Looks like this, looks like this.
You guys eat delicious food too.
You guys doing the after-party too...
There seems to be something like a bar.
Wow, but really, Captain thinks this a lot...
Performing is the best of the best, but...
There are times I really want to switch.
I want to do the after-party, Marine too.
I want to be pampered! And immensely.
"Man, Marine who was on stage just now..."
"She's too cute, I can't look directly."
"See, that female Ichimi... that female Ichimi is cute."
"Hey Female Ichimi-chan, you're cute." "This isn't a female Ichimi."
"Hah? Excuse me, what is it? I'm only interested in Marine Senchou."
"Actually, male Ichimi who are interested in anyone besides Marine Senchou are a landmine."
"Whoa, Marine Senchou is cute!" I want it to be like that.
I want to be loved, lots.
On Day 1, I thought I wanted you to hug me.
I thought "I want to be hugged by you guys".
If you're going to hug me...
The dakimakura cover is out now so...
I'd like you to hug that but...
Marine's handwritten message comes with it too.
Certainly the number is high but...
Let me write as much as needed.
"I want to hold them," I thought that.
Wait, I thought "I want to hold them".
Even if it arrives months later...
Being able to hold it months later versus...
Not being able to hold it, which is better? That's the question.
It's until tomorrow so I gotta say it.
First, flower stands and support ads...
It's different from watching at the venue...
You can look back at memories...
You can see faces up close and big so...
Please, for memories, the streaming ticket too...
All the various support acts are precious.
I'm going to eat now so...
My schedule is packed for a few days so...
Once it settles down I'll do a solo stream again.
By the way, on this ship, Beautiful Girl Innocence applies.
